Name: LX Patterns
About the game: LX Patterns is a puzzle game based on IQ tests, where the ability to recognize patterns is used to measure intelligence. The game has 60 levels with different types of patterns and the goal is to identify them. It is a game that requires a lot of logical skill from the player. Key features: 60 levels Relaxing soundtrack Fair difficulty Steam achievements No time pressure Dark and light themes
